How many people are affected by retroperitoneal fibrosis ?,"Retroperitoneal fibrosis occurs in 1 in 200,000 to 500,000 people per year. The disorder occurs approximately twice as often in men as it does in women, but the reason for this difference is unclear.",GHR,retroperitoneal fibrosis
